original_text: The sons of Jacob had come in from the field as soon as they heard of it, and the men were indignant and very angry, because he had done an outrageous thing in Israel by lying with Jacob's daughter, for such a thing must not be done.
korean_text: 야곱의 아들들은 들에서 이를 듣고 돌아와서 그들 모두가 근심하고 심히 노하였으니 이는 세겜이 야곱의 딸을 강간하여 이스라엘에게 부끄러운 일 곧 행하지 못할 일을 행하였음이더라

sentences.original_text: The sons of Jacob had come in from the field
as soon as they heard of it
because he had done an outrageous thing
for such a thing must not be done
sentences.korean_translation: 그러한 일은 행해져서는 안 되기 때문이다
